content.value: This is how great new things are built, more often than anyone has been willing to say during the last decade's cultural revolution in Silicon Valley.

name: the apocalypse, but make it fashion. ✨

content.html: No, this is how sev1 incidents are built. I don’t want the shitty output people deliver at 80+ hours/week. I want the best work my well-rested colleagues can do in a reasonable number of working hours. And I want people bringing the inspiration they find in outside interests.
content.value:
No, this is how sev1 incidents are built.

I don’t want the shitty output people deliver at 80+ hours/week. I want the best work my well-rested colleagues can do in a reasonable number of working hours.

And I want people bringing the inspiration they find in outside interests.
